result.heading: SEEN IN REFLECTION ON A SHEET OF ICE

direction.raw_text: - SEEN IN REFLECTION ON A SHEET OF ICE The moonlight intensifies almost magically, and the ice above begins to spider-web and crack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snow-covered trees in every direction. The ice in the pond continues to crack, until finally a hole splinters open. A young man floats out of the water, bathed in the intense moonlight. This is JACK FROST - thin, pale, barefoot, his tousled hair frosted white.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) But then...then I saw the moon. It was so big and it was so bright, and it seemed to chase the darkness away. And when it did...I wasn't scared anymore. Jack floats back down onto the ice as the hole closes up underneath him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Why I was there, and what I was meant to do - that I've never known. And a part of me wonders if I ever will. Jack looks around, confused, then turns toward the moonlight as it dims a bit. Jack carefully treads across the ice until he hits something with his feet. He looks down, and at his feet is a wooden staff. Curious, he picks it up. Almost immediately the staff begins to glow a cold blue in his hands. Odd. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 2. Jack almost drops it as the base of the staff comes in contact with the ground. Frost shoots out and spreads across the ice. Jack is visibly confused. He touches a few trees with his staff sending frost up their trunks. Then he swings the staff again, more confident, as he begins to run across the frozen pond. Another swing, and a gust of wind swirls him high up into the air. Jack floats for a moment only to fall back down to earth and into the trees. Jack grabs hold of a tree branch and pulls himself up to see a small town off in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A collection of simple timber houses with thatched roofs. Jack comes in for a landing, and it's a rocky one. He stands up, still elated, and brushes himself off. As Jack makes his way into town, settlers are warming their hands by campfire. Jack doesn't recognize anyone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the townsfolk) Hello. Hello. Good evening, ma'am. (BEAT) Ma'am? The settlers walk past Jack, not noticing him. Jack crouches down as a YOUNG BOY runs toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, ah, excuse me, can you tell me where I am? The boy runs right through Jack, as if he were a ghost. Jack staggers back in shock. He's speechless, as if the wind had been knocked out him. His emotions causing it to snow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello! Hello! Townsfolk continue to pass through Jack, unaware of his presence. Shaken, Jack turns and retreats into the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) My name is Jack Frost -- how do I know that? The moon told me so. But that was all he ever told me. And that was a long, long time ago. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 3. We pan up as the moon shines down over the snow covered trees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 175 - INTRO TO NORTH EXT. NORTH POLE - DUSK FIERY GYPSY VIOLIN MUSIC as we move through clouds to reveal a MASSIVE ICE CANYON, and just around a bend, the incredible hidden fortress of NORTH, aka SANTA CLAUS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We glimpse a familiar-looking RED JACKET and CAP with white trim on a coat hanger just as a pair of tongs SLAM a block of ice onto a stone work table--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : A CHAINSAW shears the block in half, spraying ice. North lifts up the chainsaw revealing a massive tatoo on his arm, the word NAUGHTY clearly visible. Three ELVES huddle in a doorway around a plate of cookies, each licking their own tasty morsel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Still waiting for cookies! As North crosses the background, the elves lower the cookies from their mouths, their faces frozen in fear. The elves duck out of the way as North launches himself across the floor on his rolling chair -- CLOSE as his huge
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: gropes furiously among his WORK TOOLS, finally grabbing a miniature HAMMER. As North's humming along with his music, delicately CHISELING into the ice, we see a second arm sleeve tatoo, the word NICE clearly visible-- His INTENSE BLUE EYE magnified in a JEWELER'S EYEPIECE -- a delicate SCULPTING TOOL cuts fine details into the ice-- His hands place the finished piece on a curving ICE TRACK: An ice LOCOMOTIVE. It belches ice vapor and chugs down the track, picking up speed--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! North's hand grabs a cookie from a plate held up by the two Elves. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 4. One of the elves gives his cohort a look and points to the plate as it chews with a mouth full of food, to which it then unfurls its tongue and lets the half eaten morsels spill out onto the plate.

direction.raw_text: Ah, finally! He takes a bite and leans toward the ice track. He chuckles as the train hits a loop, and launches off a ramp into midair

Before the Yeti can finish, a WIND whips up from out of nowhere -- North stares in outrage as a blanket of SWIRLING BLACK SAND, crawls over the lights, and shrouds the ENTIRE GLOBE in inky DARKNESS-- The elves scurry in a panic, then all at once the BLACK SAND WHOOSHES UP off the Globe -- rushes up through the ceiling as the remaining sand bursts into a puff of smoke and dissipates into the air -- As the wind dies, the scattered pieces of debris settle to the ground, and the globes lights come back on, North whirls to see a HUGE SHADOW flash across the floors and curving walls of his fortress. It quickly disappears, leaving nothing but the distant ECHO of...LAUGHTER? North is frozen, looking up into the darkness, gravely:

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 225 - GUARDIANS GATHER INT. CHILD'S BEDROOM - NIGHT A little fairy, carrying a coin, flies above the head of a sleeping child. She quickly ducks under the pillow and comes out the other side with a tooth in hand.

direction.raw_text: Hundreds of fairies fly toward a hollowed out mountain, this is Tooth's palace and it's a majestic site.

direction.raw_text: Dozens of tiny FAIRIES flit about. Teeth are filed away in tiny wooden drawers. Coins are handed out.

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Chicago, Sector 6 -- 37 molars, 22 bicuspids, 18 central incisors. Moscow, Sector 9 -- 22 incisors, 18 premolars: Uh oh, heavy rain advisory! (BEAT) Des Moines, we've got a cuspid at

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A Mini Tooth Fairy flies up to Tooth as thousands of tiny MINI TOOTH FAIRIES continue their work behind them.

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Wait! And suddenly everything stops. Tooth whips around, and we finally see her beautiful FACE. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 7. She's holding up a little tooth, and gazing at it with dreamy adoration. The surrounding fairies tweet with excitement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's her first tooth. Have you ever seen a more adorable lateral incisor in all of your life?! (GASPS) Look how she flossed! The fairies' tweets turn to concern, turning Tooth's attention to North's AURORA SIGNAL stretching across the sky. She gasps, and flies off like a rocket toward the source of the signal, accompanied by a few of her ranking fairies.

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) My fellow Guardians - It is our job to watch over the children of the world, and keep them safe - to bring wonder, hope and dreams. And so, I've called us all here for one reason, and one reason only - the children are in danger. Much of this we hear over the following...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We pull out from the face of a sleeping child to reveal a stream of sand swirling overhead. It's a dream and it's taken the shape of a child playing soccer. We FOLLOW the Dreamsand stream out his window and up into the sky where we see DOZENS of strands of sand descending to earth. Keep following up, through majestic CLOUDS... ...to reveal a small, GLOWING GOLDEN CLOUD of Dreamsand shimmering among the clouds, trailing the golden threads. The strands are being controlled by a small portly figure,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: with Sandy in the cockpit. He BARREL ROLLS the plane into a dizzying dive through the spectacular cloudscape and flies off into the distance. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 8.

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) An enemy we have kept at bay for centuries has finally decided to strike back. We alone can stop him. Much of this we hear over the following...

Speeding along through a subterranean tunnel, we can barely keep up with a DIMLY-LIT FIGURE as it races at blinding speed, leaping and zigzagging through a series of TUNNELS -- EXT. A SNOWY EXPANSE IN THE NORTH POLE A hole opens in the snow, and a pair of rabbit ears pops out. A huge rabbit climbs out and brushes off the snow, annoyed. The six foot tall figure is BUNNYMUND.

direction.raw_text: Ah, it's freezing. He shivers with cold, then goes slogging through the snow.

We move along the building, across clothes lines and power lines as they freeze. We continue to move up, and finally discover the culprit. Jack Frost makes his way atop a cathedral spire and takes in the view; the full moon bathes the city in moonlight.

direction.raw_text: Hmmmm? North is standing in front of a shelf of Russian nesting dolls. One is carved to look like North himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here. This is how you see me, no? Very big, intimidating. But if you get to know me a little-- (hands the doll to Jack) Well, go on. Jack gives North a curious look, then sets down his staff. He twists the doll in half, and inside is another carved North doll, this one is a more typical Santa Claus - red cheeked and cheery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are downright jolly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, but not just jolly... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 40. The dolls get progressively smaller as he twists them open, all versions of North, but all slightly different.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am also mysterious. (twist - smaller doll) And fearless. (twist - smaller doll) And caring. And at my center... Twist. As North approaches, Jack looks down and drops the final Russian doll into the palm of North's hand. It's the size of a jelly bean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a tiny wooden baby?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look closer. What do you see? Jack holds it up to examine it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have big eyes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Big eyes. Very big. Because they are full! Of wonder! That is my center. It is what I was born with. Eyes that have always seen the wonder in everything! North raises his hands, and the toys on the shelves suddenly spring to life. Jack-in-the-boxes pop, toy trains speed around the room, soldiers march about, toy planes fly overhead. An elf gets carried aloft by a balloon. A flying toy plane glides by and we follow it as it makes its way around the room. A Christmas tree is ablaze with bright lights. Two double doors suddenly open as the flying car enters the factory floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eyes that see lights in the trees, and magic in the air! As it crosses the frame, dozens of other toys are now flying around the massive chamber. It's a truly magical moment. North now stands outside his office, with Jack at his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This wonder is what I put into the world, and what I protect in children. (MORE) Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 41.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is what makes me a Guardian. It is my center. What is yours?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. Jack looks down into his open palm, the wooden baby stares back at him. North closes Jack's hand. They exchange a look. Then, something suddenly jets past a window outside. Almost simultaneously, Bunny and Sandman come running down the hallway toward North and Jack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have a problem, mate! Trouble at the Tooth Palace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1204 - SLEIGH LAUNCH INT. LAUNCHING SHED - A MOMENT LATER North shoves open a set of double doors, followed closely by Bunny, Sandy, and Jack. Several Yeti's rush by as they prepare the hangar for launch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (TO YETIS) Boys, ship shape. As soon as impossible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North, North! I told you, I'm not going with you guys! There is no way I'm climbing into some rickety old... Suddenly: the SOUND of POUNDING HOOVES. BEASTLY SNORTING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: comes into view. It's a huge, shiny, tricked out, jaw-dropping hot-rod of a sled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...sleigh. Jack is understandably gob-smacked, so much so that he almost gets knocked over by one of the reindeer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 42.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Moi deti, moi deti. Quiet, quiet. The sleigh comes to a standstill as the Guardians prepare to climb inside. Several Yetis are still running around making last minute preparations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, one ride, but that's it. Jack jumps aboard. North smiles knowingly, and climbs inside. Sandy hops up into the back seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone loves the sleigh. North grabs the reigns, wrapping them around his arms. He turns to see Bunnymund standing there, frozen and unnerved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny, what are you waiting for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think my tunnels might be faster, mate. And um, and safer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, get in. (hoists Bunnymund up) Buckle up! Bunny desperately looks around his seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, where are the bloody seatbelts?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was just expression! North turns to one of the Yetis .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are we ready? The Yeti throws his hands up in a fit shaking his head no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good! Let's go! Clear! (cracks the reigns) Hyah! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 43. The sleigh is off. Elves and yetis scatter out of its path. Sandy, Bunny, and Jack fly back into their seats. Bunny clutches the edge of his, terrified. Jack can't help but laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Out of the way! The sleigh heads down a luge-like track. North and Jack are enjoying the ride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hyah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ohhhhhh no! North cracks the reigns, the sleigh plummets, an almost vertical drop. Sandy grins calmly. Jack loves this. Bunnymund - not so much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slow down, slow down! North pulls a lever, kicking the sleigh into overdrive. He looks back as the sleigh enters a corkscrew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope you like the loopty loops!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope you like carrots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here we go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as the sleigh reaches the bottom of the ramp, and shoots upwards, launching them into bright blue sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North, reins in hand, leans into the wind as the reindeer climb higher.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Klasno! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 44. Jack, in his element, leaps up onto the rear of the sleigh to watch the North Pole fade into the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Bunnymund peaks off the side of the sleigh, then leans back, and holds on for dear life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Bunny-- Bunny turns to see Jack standing on the back edge of the sleigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Check out this view--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Jack is SWEPT OFF the sleigh and disappears! Bunny gasps in horror and looks over the side...only to see Jack lounging on the sleigh's skid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awww...you do care.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, rack off you bloody show pony! Bunny glowers as Jack makes his way back into the sleigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on everyone, I know a shortcut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh strewth, I knew we should have taken the tunnels. North holds a snow globe up to his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I say, Tooth Palace. An image of the Tooth Palace appears inside the snowglobe. North throws the globe into the air and a giant vortex opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hyah! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 45.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A surreal light surrounds the sleigh as it hits HYPERDRIVE and gets sucked through the snow-globe portal with a WHOOSH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1300 - TOOTH PALACE DESTROYED EXT. SKY - NEAR TOOTH'S PALACE The sleigh suddenly comes out of HYPERDRIVE at the outskirts of the Tooth Palace. Streaks of black rapidly approaching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What!? Suddenly our heroes find themselves in the midst of mayhem, as hundreds of Nightmares and terrified Tooth Fairies jet past. It's like a meteor storm. North yanks the reins, and the sleigh veers sharply, dodging the oncoming Nightmares.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are they!? Sandy and Bunny duck the onslaught.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Jack now sees that the Nightmares are actually GULPING DOWN the fleeing fairies and flying off with them. It's chaos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're taking the tooth fairies! Jack looks up to see a lone fairy with a Nightmare snapping at its heels. Jack leaps into the air and rescues it before the Nightmare can snatch it away. Jack lands back in the sleigh. He opens his hand to reveal Baby Tooth, who's shaking with fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey little Baby Tooth, you okay? As Baby Tooth nods, North steers the sleigh forward through the storm toward the entrance of Tooth's Palace. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 46.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A vast chamber supported by pillars containing millions of tiny wooden deposit boxes from floor to ceiling. North spots a Nightmare up ahead and hands Jack the reigns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, take over!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh? Jack, though surprised, quickly grabs the reigns and smiles as he snaps them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hyah! North readies his sword and SLICES the Nightmare in half -- NORTH Yah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: spill out of the split Nightmare and rain down into the sleigh at the Guardians' feet. The Nightmare disintegrates into black sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're stealing the teeth! Sandy looks at his hands and sees the Nightmare sand take shape and drift away. He and Bunny exchange a look. The Guardians turn -- they're headed straight for a pillar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, look out! Jack pulls the reins -- JACK Aaaahhhh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the sleigh nearly misses the pillar and skids to a rough stop on a platform. They see Tooth up above.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tooth! Are you alright? Tooth is flying around, visibly frustrated. This is bad. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 47.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They, they took my fairies! And the teeth! All of them! Everything is gone! Everything. Only then does it hit her. Tooth's wings drop in defeat. She's completely lost amidst the devastation. The Guardians rush to comfort her. Jack stays behind as Baby Tooth pops out from the hood of his tunic and flies over toward Tooth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh thank goodness! One of you is alright!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I have to say, this is very, very exciting. Pitch's voice echoes across the open chamber. They look up to see Pitch, standing high above them with a satisfied smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Big Four, all in one place. I'm a little star-struck. (BEAT) Did you like my show on the globe, North? Got you all together, didn't I? Tooth darts after Pitch, but he escapes into the shadows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch, you have got thirty seconds to return my fairies!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Or what? Tooth follows the sound of Pitch's voice and finds him near one of her tooth box columns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll stick a quarter under my pillow?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you doing this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe I want what you have. To be believed in. Jack takes this in. Pitch moves along the walls and shadows of the chamber and emerges from behind a column. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 48.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe I'm tired of hiding under beds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe that's where you belong.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, go suck an egg, rabbit! Bunny looks down past the edge of the platform to find Pitch upside down, staring him in the face. Pitch disappears again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Hang on, is that...Jack Frost? (LAUGHS) Since when are you all so chummy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh good. Jack turns and sees Pitch standing in the middle of a column.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A neutral party. Then I'm going to ignore you. But, you must be used to that by now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch! You shadow sneaking rat- bag! Come here! Bunny goes after Pitch, but he disappears and reemerges on an opposite column. Tooth spots him, grabs one of Bunny's boomerangs and flies at Pitch in a rage...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh! Pitch looks at Tooth with a smile and before she can reach him, a huge Nightmare darts out of hiding and rears up at her. Tooth falls back. Baby Tooth hides in Jack's tunic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Hey, easy, girl. Easy. Pitch draws a wisp of black sand from Onyx's mane, twirls it in his palm, and turns toward Sandy. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 49.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look familiar, Sandman? Took me a while to perfect this little trick. Turning dreams into Nightmares. Pitch notices the shocked Guardians.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be nervous, it only riles them up more. They smell fear you know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What fear? Of you!? No one's been afraid of you since the Dark Ages! Pitch's eyes flash with anger. But then he smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, the Dark Ages.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - FLASHBACK A parent and her two children, huddled around a campfire, scream as a shadow, resembling Pitch, washes over them. It makes its way up the side of a mountain to reveal Pitch, smiling as he stares up at the moon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (NOSTALGIC) Everyone frightened. Miserable. Such happy times for me. Oh, the power I wielded!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - FLASHBACK - CONTINUOUS PITCH (V.O.) But then the Man in the Moon chose you to replace my fear with your wonder and light! North's sleigh flies in front of the moon. Tooth and her fairies flit by while SANDY's Dreamsand dances across the sky and Bunny leaps across rooftops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Lifting their hearts! And giving them hope! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 50. Pitch, thinner and weaker than he is now, slips back into the shadows after children run through him while playing in the streets, laughing as they go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Meanwhile, everyone wrote me off as just a bad dream! "Oh, there's nothing to be afraid of! There's no such thing as the Boogeyman!"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch leans toward the Guardians, showing nothing but contempt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well that's all about to change.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: behind Pitch: one of the COLUMNS of the Palace begins to crack and crumble, as if decaying. Tooth is stunned...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh look, it's happening already.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is? Tooth's eyes widen in shock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Children are waking up and realizing the Tooth Fairy never came. Lifting pillows and finding their BABY TEETH still there.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: VIGNETTES OF CHILDREN AROUND THE WORLD PITCH

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I mean such a little thing, but to a child...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the last VIGNETTE, all the way out of TOOTH'S WIDE-OPEN EYE, and BACK TO SCENE. Jack, mystified, moves closer to Tooth as the palace continues to crumble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They, they don't believe in me anymore. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 51.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't they tell you, Jack? It's great being a Guardian -- but there's a catch. If enough kids stop believing, everything your friends protect - wonder, hopes and dreams - it all goes away. And little by little, so do they. Jack's realizes now the magnitude of Pitch's plan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No Christmas, or Easter, or little fairies that come in the night. There will be nothing. But fear and darkness and me! It's your turn not to be believed in! Bunny throws his boomerangs at Pitch, who quickly ducks out of the way as they fly around the chamber columns. Pitch then jumps onto the back of Onyx down into the depths of the Palace. The Guardians dive after him, followed by Jack. Bunny grabs a set of egg bombs and launches them at Pitch, exploding seconds before Pitch hits the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1325 - JACK'S DECISION INT. TOOTH PALACE - LAGOON - MOMENTS LATER The Guardians land -- NORTH He's gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tooth, deflated, sits on the ground with an empty tooth box in her hands. Baby Tooth, resting on a nearby broken tooth box, looks to Tooth with concern. Jack walks up and crouches down alongside Tooth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Okay, alright I admit it, you were right about Pitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) This is one time I wish I was wrong. But he will pay. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 52.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, about the fairies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (not her bubbly self) You should've seen them. They put up such a fight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would Pitch take the teeth?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not the teeth he wanted. It's the memories inside them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean? Tooth leads Jack across the pond, the water freezing under his feet as he walks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's why we collect the teeth, Jack. They hold the most important memories of childhood. Tooth directs him to a MURAL, which illustrates this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My fairies and I watch over them and when someone needs to remember what's important, we help them. Jack takes a second to admire the immense beauty of the mural before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We had everyone's here. Yours too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My memories?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From when you were young. Before you became Jack Frost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But, I wasn't anyone before I was Jack Frost. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 53.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course you were. We were all someone before we were chosen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should've seen Bunny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I told you never to mention that! Jack, confused, is trying to process all this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That night at the pond...I just, why I assumed...Are you saying, are you saying I had a life before that? With a home? And a family?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really don't remember? Jack's expression says it all. Finally the key to all his questions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All these years, and the answers were right here. If I find my memories, then I'll know why I'm here. (TO TOOTH) You have to show me. Jack, using his control of the wind, lifts up off the ground and flies across the pond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I can't, Jack. Pitch has them. Jack floats down onto a rock, overlooking the Guardians.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then we have to get them back! Suddenly, a patch of Tooth's feathers fall out, and disappears. The Guardians eyes fill with worry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 54. Jack is stricken. He looks back -- the ancient MURAL begins
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The children. We're too late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! No! No such thing as too late! (GETS IDEA) Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Idea!! HAHH!! He's gleeful. The others look at each other as if he's nuts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We will collect the teeth!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We get teeth! Children keep believing in you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're talking seven continents! Millions of kids!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me break! You know how many toys I deliver in one night?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And eggs I hide in one day? North turns to Jack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Jack, if you help us, we will get you your memories. Jack looks to Tooth, who gives him a reassuring smile. Sandy gives to enthusiastic thumbs up while Bunny groans. Jack looks back to North with a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 55.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1350 - TOOTH COLLECTION EXT. SHANGHAI ROOFTOPS - NIGHT We transition to the SHANGHAI SKYLINE as North BOOMS up out of a chimney, dashing along the rooftops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quickly! Quickly! North BOOMS down another chimney as Bunnymund races into view a rooftop away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here we go, here we go... Jack zips into view, calling out to Bunny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hop to it rabbit, I'm five teeth ahead!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah right, look, I'd tell you to stay outta my way, but really what's the point -- because you won't be able to keep up anyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that a challenge, cottontail?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you don't wanna race a rabbit, mate. As we pan across the rooftops, BOOM! North bursts up out of a nearby chimney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A race? Is it a race?? North jumps into one chimney, then shoots out of another across the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is going to be... North disappears down yet another chimney only to emerge with a bang out the top of another. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 56.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: EPIC!! As North leaps out of frame, Tooth darts into view, in hummingbird overdrive, dazzled by the lights and traffic. Baby Tooth struggles to keep up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four bicuspids over there! An incisor two blocks east! Is that a molar? They're EVERYWHERE! Tooth, overwhelmed, jets off without paying attention and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: she smacks into a TOOTHPASTE BILLBOARD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow! Jack jumps up to the billboard to check on her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine...sorry, it's been a really long time since I've been out in the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long is a long time?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, four hundred forty years...give or take. Tooth jerks to attention: suddenly her VIEW ZOOMS IN thru a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : a tiny GLOW under her pillow marks a freshly planted TOOTH. Tooth gasps and her eyes go wide -- she FLIES to the window, excited. Jack reacts, looks to Baby Tooth: it's gonna be a long night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmm...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, cocksure, arrives outside an open window. His smile suddenly disappears when he sees a RABBIT HOLE open up in the bedroom floor and Bunny hops out. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 57.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS Bunny, now holding the tooth in his paw, turns to Jack and laughs. Jack, not amused, zaps Bunny with burst of frost from his staff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Aaahhh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Guardians fly over a Middle Eastern city in North's sleigh as the full moon lights up the night sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North pulls TWO teeth, one with each hand: TWINS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yipa!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny pulls out his hand from under a pillow revealing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jackpot! Pull out wider to reveal HOCKEY TROPHIES, POSTERS and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Bunny grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like you're a bit of a brumby, hey mate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North stands at the side of a boy's bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is piece of pie! He falls into a rabbit hole, finding himself face to face with Bunny. He growls. SANDMAN enters and takes the boy's tooth for himself. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 58.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's my tooth! Sandy! Sandy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack parkours between two buildings and into a window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS Jack flies in through the window when suddenly, a rabbit hole appears. As Jack disappears through the rabbit hole, Bunny appears through an adjacent hole laughing to himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEDROOM NIGHT Tooth reaches under a pillow and pulls out a Tooth with a mouse attached to the other end. Baby Tooth tackles the mouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Take it easy there, champ! He's one of us! Part of the European division. (to the mouse) Ca va? The mouse gestures back angrily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North and the Guardians, riding North's sleigh, exit a wormhole. North laughs as they fly over the city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny pulls a note from under a pillow instead of a tooth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh? The note shows an arrow, pointing toward the window. He looks up to the window: North holds up a tooth as he grins, then leaps off the ledge laughing. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 59.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny lands on a rooftop, holding a tooth in his paw, and proud of himself. Then, Bunny hears the sound of ice and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crikey! --and disappears from view. Bunny is now sliding down the side of a roof on a sheet of ice. Jack grabs the tooth from Bunny's paw as he slides past and holds it high in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Jack holds up the tooth, but within moments a hand snatches it. Jack looks to see Sandy waving `bye-bye' as he flies off on his Dreamsand cloud.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!
direction.name: direction

result.heading: DROP FAST THROUGH THE ROOF AND CEILING

direction.raw_text: North dances across a rooftop and quickly drops into a chimney to enter a house -- we DROP FAST THROUGH THE ROOF AND CEILING...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...to see BUNNY'S PAW as it LIGHTS THE FIREPLACE. Bunny grins demonically in the firelight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Haha! Ho, ho, ho!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A large burst of fire shoots out the top of a distant chimney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Ahh! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 60.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, North, Sandy, and Bunny stand proudly. Each one of them revealing their own bag filled with teeth to Tooth. Tooth is overwhelmed by their collective effort.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow! You guys collect teeth and leave gifts as fast as my fairies. Their eyes widen and Tooth is suddenly panic stricken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You guys have been leaving gifts, right? The rest of the group turns to each other, sinking their heads and biting their lips in embarrassment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS The Guardians stand in line, waiting their turn to put dollar bills into a coin dispenser.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: S, VERY FAST - Baby Tooth puts a COIN under a pillow. - Now Jack puts a coin under a pillow. - North's hand pulls a Tooth from under a pillow. He replaces it pair of CANDY CANES and a few COINS. - Bunny stomps his feet and falls through a rabbit hole to reveal a pair of Easter Eggs atop a child's bed. - Sandy walks through a doggy door with a coin in his hand. In shock, he sees North laughing while arranging Christmas decorations in the child's bedroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A young boy, holding a stuffed animal and a sippy cup to his mouth, looks out his bedroom window. The Guardians, cast in moonlight, bound across the adjacent rooftops. The young boy, dumbfounded, drops his juice. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 61.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Guardians fly across the night sky only to disappear through a snowglobe portal. Nearby, a Nightmare observes as the sleigh vanishes. It leaps off the roof, through a drain, and down into the sewers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1650 - PITCH'S LAIR INT. PITCH'S LAIR - NIGHT The SPY NIGHTMARE flies down into a dark cavernous space. Large STEEL CAGES hang all around and trapped inside are the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Nightmare heads toward Pitch, standing at his own GLOBE, which is conspicuously covered in lights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lights...why aren't they going out? The Nightmare approaches from behind and lets out a soft whiney; Pitch stiffens at the news.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're collecting the teeth? The MINI TEETH perk up at this, and start twittering excitedly, which echoes throughout the lair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh pipe down, or I'll stuff a pillow with you! The Mini Teeth begin to settle down. PITCH looks at the Nightmare, frustrated, and scowls. The Nightmare winces and disperses into tiny particles. A strand of NIGHTMARE SAND from the Nightmare twirls in the air, and Pitch twists it with his fingers, turning it into a crude image of the SANDMAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine, have your last hurrah. For tomorrow, all you pathetic scrambling will be for nothing. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 62. And he crushes the image in his fist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1575 - IN JAMIE'S BEDROOM INT. JAMIE'S BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS A cool looking ROBOT TOY rests on Jamie's bedside table. Jamie is sound asleep in bed. A smile across his face reveals the recently formed gap between his teeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Left central incisor, knocked out in a freak sledding accident. I wonder how that could have happened, Jack? Jack laughs as he looks at JAMIE'S DRAWING of himself during the SNOWBALL FIGHT on the wall. He's midair, blasting his friends with snowballs. He smiles and then turns to Tooth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kids, huh? He watches as Tooth reaches under the pillow. She hovers over Jamie as he stirs in his sleep. A dreamy smile comes over her as she gazes down at the sleeping boy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This was always the part I liked most - seeing the kids. (BEAT) Why did I ever stop doing this? A beat; Jack sees how much it means to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a little different up close, huh? Tooth gives him a look: he's right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for being here, Jack. I wish I had known about your memory, I could've helped you. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 63.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, look let's just get you taken care of. Then it's Pitch's turn, huh? A sudden COMMOTION. They both turn to the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here you are! North, carrying a large sack over his shoulder, struggles to climb in through the small window. Sandman and Baby Tooth climb in after. Everybody whispers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, what gives slowpokes!? Jamie is still sound asleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How you feeling, Toothy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Believed in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Haha! That's what I want to hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Oh I see how it is... Bunny comes in through a rabbit hole in the floorboards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All working together to make sure the rabbit gets last place. North now holds his index fingers up to his lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think I need help to beat a bunny? Check it out, Peter Cottontail. Jack lifts up his sack of teeth. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 64.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You call that a bag of choppers? (lifting larger sack) Now that's a bag of choppers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen! Gentlemen! This is about Tooth. It's not a competition! But if it was -- (reveals even larger sack) I win. YEEEEEHAAAHH! And he strikes a Russian dancing pose as... Suddenly a bright circle of light is cast on the Guardians.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.C.) (SURPRISED) Santa Claus? They all turn slowly to see Jamie sitting up in bed, holding a flashlight, wide awake and beaming in disbelief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Easter Bunny?...Sandman...The Tooth Fairy! I knew you'd come!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surprise! (GIGGLING) We came!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He can see us? Jamie looks around, amazed, he sees everyone but Jack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Most of us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shhh! You guys, he's still awake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy! Knock him out! They all look to him, scandalized. Jamie looks concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 65.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With the Dreamsand, ya gumbies. But then Jamie's GREYHOUND rises up into frame, fully awake, its nostrils flaring at the scent he's picked up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, stop that's the Easter Bunny. What are you doing, Abbey? Down! The dog is nose to nose with Bunnymund.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, nobody panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But that's a um, that's a greyhound. Do you know what greyhounds do to rabbits?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it's a pretty safe bet he's never met a rabbit like me - While Sandy forms a Dreamsand baseball, Jack rolls his eyes and notices an alarm clock on the bedside table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Six foot one, nerves of steel, master of tai-chi and the ancient
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack can't resist: he reaches over stealthily and SETS OFF THE ALARM CLOCK with his staff. RRRRRIIIIING!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crikey. Bunny is off like a shot, the greyhound right on his tail, running laps in the small room, the dog barking like crazy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop! Sit! Sandy, amused, makes a Dreamsand baseball to stop the dog, but bobbles it as the dog brushes past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Down girl, down! The others stand out of the way as Bunny and the dog run up the walls and over the bed. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 66. As Tooth tries to silence the alarm clock, Jack can barely contain his laughter. Sandy takes aim as Bunny and the dog run circles around him--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy, Sandy! The dog jumps past North, knocking him back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah! As Sandy winds up, the dog suddenly SMACKS right into him. The Dreamsand goes flying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, this is not proper Tooth Fairy behavior! North ducks out of the way as the Dreamsand sails toward him. The Dreamsand baseball smacks Tooth right in the face and explodes into golden dust. Tooth and her fairy fall to the ground as a golden tooth takes shape above their heads. Streams of Dreamsand make their way around the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.C.) Ah, this thing's rabid! Get this dingo off me! Bunny gets a whiff of the golden sand. The image of a carrot quickly takes shape in front of his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Bunny falls over asleep. THUD! So does the dog. North tries to scramble out of the way, but there's no escape in this tiny room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Candy canes... He teeters for a moment as Dreamsand candy canes appear before him, then falls like a giant Sequoia, landing - THUD! - on the end of Jamie's bed, which sends Jamie catapulting through the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoaaaaaaaaaa! Luckily he lands -- OOF! -- in Sandy's arms. He starts to wake up AGAIN, but Sandy is there with a fistful of sand -- BOOF! -- and Jamie too is out cold. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 67. Jack and Sandy look down at the sleeping boy, relieved. Then they look around -- a heap of sleeping, snoring bodies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoops... Bunny is snuggled up next to North. A carrot and candy canes, made of Dreamsand, hold hands as they dance above Bunny and North's head. Jack comes down off the dresser and turns to Sandy, who has put Jamie back in bed. Sandy lifts North's arm and lets go, it's completely limp and falls flat. Sandy smiles at Jack, who chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I really wish I had a camera right now. Sandy eyes suddenly widen. There's a Nightmare behind Jack. Jack turns to see A NIGHTMARE staring through the window. Without hesitation, Jack jumps out the window after it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (SHOUTS) Sandy, c'mon! We can find Pitch. Sandy pauses for a moment, then follows Jack's lead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - INTERCUT The sleeping Guardians are where we left them. Jamie's bedroom door opens, and Sophie toddles in. She takes in the scene, amused. She toddles over to North, giggling. She pokes at his rotund belly. Then she notices something. She reaches into his pocket and pulls out a snow globe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty! She looks over to see the Easter Bunny, sound asleep on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny! Hop! Hop! Hop! Suddenly the snow globe lights up. Sophie's eyes widen as she looks at the beautiful vista inside the globe. It's Bunny's warren. She takes the globe and toddles off for the door, when she trips - again - and the snow globe smashes on the floor. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 68.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !! A flash of LIGHT. She looks up to see a magical portal open in front of her. A GUST WIND comes blowing out of the portal. Sophie giggles, and toddles through the portal. North's bleary EYES pop open mid-snore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whuh-huh...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1600 - SANDMAN ATTACKED EXT. BURGESS NEIGHBORHOOD - NIGHT TWO NIGHTMARES zigzag along the rooftops, searching for victims. Jack, loving the chase, is in hot pursuit with Sandy, who's riding along on a streak of Dreamsand--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wahooo! (BEAT) Haha! Yes! One of the Nightmares splits off, angling for a BEDROOM WINDOW. Sandy calmly follows-- The Nightmare flies right through the WINDOW and SANDY does the same -- the OTHER ONE angles up over the house's ROOF to evade Jack, who PARKOURS over the roof after it--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Waaahahoooo! Through the WINDOWS BELOW, FLASHES OF GOLDEN and SICKLY GREEN LIGHT race through the house as Sandy battles the Nightmare-- The Nightmares and Jack ZOOM away from the house just as Sandy and the FIRST NIGHTMARE blast out of the window, Sandy wrestling it until -- POOF! It explodes into golden
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: which he quickly transforms into a Sting Ray for him to ride-- Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 69.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack flies through town on the heels of the Nightmare. It makes a sharp turn down an alleyway and Jack is quick to follow. The Nightmare then veers up the wall of the alley and onto a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Jack whips a blast from his staff and HITS the Nightmare before it disappears from view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: HAAAH! I got it! Jack jumps up onto the roof and prods the frozen Nightmare with his staff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy! Sandy, did you see that?!? Look at this thing! Jack can barely contain his excitement as he calls out to Sandy -- but suddenly Pitch lurches out from behind an air conditioning unit on the rooftop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frost? Jack blasts a WAVE OF FROST across the rooftop, but Pitch easily dodges it, reappearing behind Jack on the adjoining rooftop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, for a "neutral party" you spend an awful lot of time with those weirdos. (BEAT) This isn't your fight, Jack. Jack's eyes narrow. He holds out his staff, ready to strike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You made it my fight when you stole those teeth. Pitch regards him curiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Teeth? Why do you care about the teeth? When he notices something and turns to find Sandy calmly standing on the rooftop next to him. Pitch quickly sidesteps, moving away from Sandy. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 70.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now this is who I'm looking for-- Before Pitch can finish a DREAMSAND STREAM whips around him, forcing him to duck and dodge Sandy's sudden attack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa--?? Pitch DISPERSES a stream of NIGHTMARE SAND, turning it into a gigantic sickle and swings it back at Sandy. Jack ducks, avoiding injury as Sandy's pushed back against a ledge. Sandy quickly grabs Pitch with another DREAMSAND STREAM and yanks him off his feet, slamming him repeatedly against the tops of the buildings until finally throwing him off the rooftop. Pitch bounces off the ground as he crashes into an EMPTY STREET. As Sandy dusts his hands and calmly steps off the rooftop to follow, Jack looks on, astonished.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remind me not to get on your bad side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch shakes off the crash, trying to back up as Sandy touches down and moves toward him, Jack following. Pitch cowers on the ground in fear as they approach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looks up, pleading) Okay, easy! You can't blame me for trying, Sandy. You don't know what it's like to be weak and hated. It was stupid of me to mess with your dreams. So I'll tell you what- Sandy continues forward, grim faced...but suddenly Pitch stops cowering and stands up. His tone changes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can have `em back! Before Jack and Sandy can react, a Nightmare shoots up through a storm drain as several other Nightmares gather in the alley behind him. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 71. Jack and Sandy look around as hundreds of Nightmares descend from the surrounding rooftops to encircle them. This doesn't look good. Jack, worried, looks to Sandy and mutters...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You take the ones on the left, I'll take the ones on the right? Meanwhile, Pitch rises up from off the ground as Onyx takes shape underneath him. Pitch grabs onto Onyx's mane as it snorts and snarls. He then leans forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boo! Pitch's army of Nightmares begin to charge. Then suddenly, the sound of BELLS and REINDEER echo in the distance--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: bursts through the clouds. Jack and Pitch look up into the sky as it circles overhead. The sleigh turns toward Pitch, only to fly a few feet over his head. Pitch turns as it passes over him, slightly confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North's asleep at the wheel, along with Bunny and Tooth. Suddenly, the sleigh clips one of its skis as it flies over City Hall, jolting North to attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah! Bunny awakes with a fright from a bad a dream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get outta my warren! (realizes he's awake now) Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still battling Nightmares, Sandy propels himself and Jack into the air with a stream of Dreamsand and launches Jack away from the Nightmares. Jack quickly orients himself and knocks an oncoming Nightmare with his staff. Tooth quickly jumps off the side of the sleigh toward Jack and Sandy. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 72. Jack, knocks away a few more Nightmares with his staff, and looks up. Tooth suddenly flies into view through the swarm of Nightmares, slicing them apart with her wings, causing them to EXPLODE into BLACK SAND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch gives a signal and leaps into the air, leading another wave of Nightmares after the Guardians.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back in the sleigh, Bunny jumps out and lands on a nearby roof. Bunny quickly tosses his boomerang which disintegrates every Nightmare in its path. Bunny catches the returning boomerang, leaps off the roof, and grabs the skids of the sleigh as it passes by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North stands, drawing both his scimitars, and dices the oncoming Nightmares to bits as they attack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha. Ha. Ha. Come on! Jack heads back to the sleigh by dodging two Nightmares as they attack. As he continues his descent, Jack is suddenly blind sided by another Nightmare, which knocks the staff from his hands. For a moment, Jack is in a state of panic as he finds himself in free fall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaaaaaaah! He finally manages to hook onto the staff, control his descent, and land on the sleigh as it flies past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (coolly, to Jack) You might want to duck. Jack DUCKS as a Nightmare rears up behind him, but one of Bunny's BOOMERANGS blasts through it and zips back to Bunny's waiting paw. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 73.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy high up in he clouds, does his best to contain the MASS OF NIGHTMARES that are swirling around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch rises from behind a group of Nightmares. He stretches his arms as an ARROW of NIGHTMARE SAND forms behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack and the Guardians watch as more Nightmares speed away to join their herd. Sandy looks overwhelmed by the onslaught.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We gotta help Sandy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hyah! North cracks the reigns, turns the sleigh, and heads toward the swirling cloud of yellow and black sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch takes aim and releases the arrow. It flies through the air and into SANDY'S back, exploding on impact.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Guardians look on, horrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noooo! Jack leaps ahead of the sleigh and flies toward Sandy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy feels the shock and turns around. A patch of blackness starts slowly spreading across his body. Pitch laughs as he and Sandy lock eyes. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 74.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hahahahaha!...Don't fight the fear, little man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Guardians continue to speed toward Sandy, but Nightmares begin colliding with the sleigh, slowing their progress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry, hurry!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch relishes this moment of triumph.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd say sweet dreams, but there aren't any left. Sandy, his eyes filled with terror, falls to his knees as the patch of blackness continues to spread.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack presses on, trying to reach Sandy as fast as he can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy stands up, accepting his fate, and closes his eyes as he and his Dreamsand cloud are consumed by the writhing blackness of the Nightmare sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Horrified, clenches his staff as he flies toward Pitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...NOOOOOO!!!! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 75.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy's gone. His beautiful Golden Dreamsand, now black, merges with the rest of Pitch's Nightmare sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is beyond delighted. His plan actually worked! Pitch then notices Jack flying towards him, glowing energy emanating from Jack's staff. Pitch raises his hands and sends a massive wave of Nightmares toward Jack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Guardians are stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack quickly realizes that's he's in over his head as the attacking Nightmares begin to overtake him. He's engulfed by Nightmares and there is nothing but silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch looks on with a smile until a bolt of lightning suddenly erupts from within the writhing black sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhhhhh!!!!! A gust of wind blows past Pitch, quickly followed by a massive wave of ice and frost that rockets back up the stream of Nightmare sand toward him, culminating in an explosion of ice and snow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack free falls back to Earth, unconscious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 76. Tooth quickly rescues him and sets him back down in the sleigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, how did you do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I, I didn't know I could.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch pulls himself laboriously from the mud and weeds amongst the trees where he's crash-landed, oddly, he seems delighted. He looks up to see a BRIGHT GLOW -- North's SNOWGLOBE PORTAL. The sleigh zooms into it and it WINKS OUT. Pitch shakes the FROST from his arms as scores of Nightmares swarm behind Pitch, regrouping after the blast. Pitch, at the center, seems as pleased as can be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finally! Someone who knows how to have a little FUN!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1700 - GUARDIANS REGROUP INT. NORTH POLE - GLOBE ROOM - DAY We're in the midst of a somber ceremony, marking the passing of Sandy. Burning candles line the perimeter of Sandy's stone emblem. Tooth sets down a candle and stands shoulder to shoulder with North and Bunny. The three hold hands in solace. The ringing of somber bells can be heard echoing throughout the chamber, as we reveal the elves and a yeti ringing the elf bells as part of a ceremonial dirge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DAY - MOMENTS LATER Jack, facing a window, FROSTS OVER THE GLASS with his finger to form a symbol of Sandy. North slowly walks up behind him. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 77.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you alright? Jack remains still, his eyes fixed on the image of Sandy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just, I wish I could've done something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Done something? Jack, you stood up to Pitch. You saved us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Sandy wo--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (putting his hand on
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would be proud of what you did. Jack pulls back his hoodie and stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know who you were in your past life, but in this life you are Guardian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But how can I know who I am, until I find out who I was?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will. I feel it, in my belly. Jack and North approach the globe which is losing lights at an alarming rate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look how fast they're going out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's fear. He's tipped the balance. Jack drifts up closer the globe. He looks at the lights going out, then back to the Guardians. There's a nervous tension in the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (twirling his boomerang) Hey, buck up ya sad-sacks. Come on! We can still turn this around! (MORE) Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 78.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Easter is tomorrow and I need your help. I say we pull out all the stops and we get those little lights flickering again!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A massive wooden door swings open; North leads Jack and the Guardians through the doorway, into an elevator, and through his factory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny is right. (TO BUNNY) As much as it pains me to say old friend, this time Easter is more important than Christmas!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Did everyone hear that?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We must hurry to the Warren. Everyone, to the sleigh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ohh no, mate. My warren my rules. Buckle up. Bunny directs the groups attention to the ground. He taps his foot and a rabbit hole opens up under their feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shostakovich!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1775 - PREPARATION FOR EASTER INT. BUNNYMUND'S TUNNELS - DAY The Guardians plummet through Bunny's tunnels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, Bunny and Tooth arrive gracefully in the warren's antechamber, while North and the yetis comes to a crashing halt. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 79.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Buckle up." Is very funny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome to the warren-- Bunny stands before them when suddenly, he shifts his attention. He turns, his ears perk up and his nose sniffs the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something's up. Something's amiss. A faint scream begins to echo from within the depths of one of Bunny's egg tunnels. Tiny eggs come scuttling out from the tunnel. Bunny grabs his boomerang, North draws his sword, and Jack readies his staff as the sounds of booming footsteps, screams, and the rustling of foliage grows louder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhhh! Bunny begins to charge toward the tunnel. At his side are the Guardians, yetis, and sentinel eggs all bellowing their loudest battle cries until...Sophie bursts out. All momentum comes to a halt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sophie? They immediately withdraw their weapons, mildly embarrassed. Sophie giggles and immediately runs after one of the elves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elf, elf, elf!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is SHE doing HERE!!? North looks down at his coat pocket - ooops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, snow globe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crikey! Somebody do something!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't look at me, I'm invisible, remember? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 80. Sophie giggles as she drags the elf by the bell atop its uniform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, Bunny. I bet she's a fairy fan. (flies up to Sophie) It's okay little one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awww! You know what, I got something for you. Here it is. (she pulls something out) Look at all the pretty teeth with little blood and gum on them. Sophie runs away screaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blood and gums? When was the last time you guys actually hung out with kids? Meanwhile, Sophie is running around the warren, exploring and playing. Sophie pokes her head into a small tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peek-a-boo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are very busy bringing joy to children! We don't have time... (EMBARRASSED) ...for children. Jack walks toward her, forming a SNOWFLAKE, which floats over toward Sophie. She tries to grab at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If one little kid can ruin Easter, then...we're in worse shape than I thought. Sophie follows the snowflake as Jack leads it over to Bunny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weeee! Weee, weee, weee! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 81. The snowflake lands on Bunny's nose and his concerns suddenly seem to slip away. Jack's magic is taking affect.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DAY - MOMENTS LATER Close up on a flower, that opens to reveal an egg. The egg stands up wobbly on its spindly little legs. We pull out to reveal Sophie and Bunny's faces looking on, Sophie amazed, Bunny proud.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanna paint some eggs? Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on then! We pull out further to reveal a massive stone spire, covered in moss, as thousands of unpainted eggs stream down the side of it toward a green meadow. North and Jack stand in the midst of it all, slack-jawed, as the eggs rush towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rimsky Korsakov! That's a lot of eggs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, how much time do we have?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weeeeee!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woooohoooo! Bunny hops into view, Sophie clinging to his back smiling, leading a huge mass of eggs down a wide PATH. As he passes,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on either side in his wake, BLASTING the passing eggs with color as they go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Alright troops, it's time to push back. That means eggs! Everywhere! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 82.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North looks out over the eggs as they get sorted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Single file! Sophie, on her back, is carried by the eggs through the sorting stones. She giggles as North waves at her while she passes by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Heaps of you in every high-rise, farm house and trailer park! Baby Tooth flies across the screen, diverting our attention to a multicolored stream off in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) In tennis shoes and cereal bowls! Baby Tooth joins an elf, who stands alongside an egg at the edge of a cliff. The elf pushes the egg over the cliff, into the stream, and celebrates with a victory dance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Oh, there will be bathtubs filled with my beautiful googies! The elf turns just in time to see a stampede of colored eggs come barreling toward him. They knock him off the cliff as he and the eggs spill into the multi-colored stream below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Colored eggs wade through the water, emerging with SECONDARY COLORS and intricate PATTERNS of all kinds. An unlucky egg veers off and gets stuck in a WHIRLPOOL. We see a hand fish it out to reveal North, who looks at the egg curiously. It's now got a SPIRAL PATTERN on it and its little LEGS kick madly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, that's little strange.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Naw, mate -- Bunny's surrounded by butterflies and cute little eggs. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 83.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's adorable. As a technicolored elf climbs out of the stream, North sets the egg down and lets it rejoin the herd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Sophie leads a parade of eggs, Bunny jumps to an adjacent rock and sits up to address the eggs as they walk in stride. Meanwhile, Jack rides atop a group of sentinel egg that are marching in the back ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There will be springtime! On every continent! And I'm bringing hope with me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - CONTINUOUS CLOSE ON: a line of eggs running down curled vines as yetis sprinkle them with glitter. They continue on down various vine corkscrew-like shoots, decorating the eggs with stripes. A confused elf emerges from the vines, striped with paint and walks off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - CONTINUOUS The striped elf walks past a Yeti, painting a mound of eggs red. Bunny enters frame and hops across the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too Christmas-y, mate, paint `em blue. The Yeti throws its arms up in defeat and tosses the eggs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A beautifully painted egg hides in the grass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Oh, what's over there? Sophie appears, spots the egg, and delicately lifts it out of the grass. She holds it close to admire the intricate detail of its shell. Sophie brings the egg to Bunny for him to inspect. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 84.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's a beauty! Bunny takes Sophie by the hand and leads her through a stone archway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now all we gotta do is get him and his little mates through the tunnels, to the top, and we'll have ourselves Easter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny looks out proudly at the eggs gathered in front of the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in the distance. Jack approaches from behind and makes his way alongside Bunny, who holds Sophie in his arms. Its our first real vista of the whole warren. It's a spectacular sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not bad. Sophie yawns and begins to fall asleep. Bunny turns to Jack with a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not bad yourself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I'm sorry about that whole, you know, the "kangaroo" thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the accent, isn't it? North comes up from behind with Tooth at his side. They turn toward Bunny, marveling at the sight of Sophie, fast sleep. It's touching. Bunny's face softens, as if remembering a distant memory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, poor little ankle-biter. Look at her, all tuckered out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love her! They look up from the sleeping toddler toward Jack. He's taught them something today. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 85.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it's time to get her home. Bunny hands the sleeping Sophie over to Tooth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about I take her home?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, no! Pitch is--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --no match for this. (twirls his staff)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which is why we need you here, with us. The Guardians look at Jack with concern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust me, I'll be quick as a bunny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1804 - RETURNING SOPHIE INT. SOPHIE'S BEDROOM - NIGHT Jack tries to lay a sleeping Sophie down in her bed, but she won't let go of his neck. Finally, she releases her grasp only to roll over and fall out of bed. Baby Tooth gives Jack a scornful look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Sophie? Is that you? Jack and Baby Tooth's eyes widen. Sophie, asleep on the floor, is quickly covered with a blanket and given a squeaky stuffed animal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack closes the window and looks to Baby Tooth with a sign of relief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should get back. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 86. Baby Tooth nods, when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (LAUGHING) Jack... Jack stops, confused. Where is that voice coming from? He looks out across the town, toward the woods, and the sound of the echoed voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That voice, I know that voice... Baby Tooth looks to him, worried.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Jack... With that, Jack leaps off the window ledge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, carried by the wind, flies across town toward the sound of the eerie voice. Baby Tooth follows, trying to keep up. Jack takes a moment to orient himself and lands, settling on a rotating vent; as the momentum slowly spins him around, the voice calls out to him again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Jack... Jack turns, looks to the woods, and takes off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack and Baby Tooth land in the middle of a thickly wooded area. It's spooky. Jack scans the forest when again he hears...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Jack... Jack gives chase. He sprints through the thickets and enters a clearing only to find the decrepit remains of a rotting frame from a child's bed. Very creepy. What would that be doing in the woods, and how long has it been here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, there's still time. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 87. Baby Tooth desperately tries to get Jack's attention by tugging at his tunic, and tweeting desperately. Jack takes his staff, and breaks through the damaged frame, revealing a hole leading deep underground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Jack... What to do? Jack jumps down the hole, reluctantly followed by Baby Tooth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2100 - PITCH TRICKS JACK INT. PITCH'S TUNNELS Jack continues along a long dark tunnel with Baby Tooth close behind. Eventually the labyrinth opens up to reveal a huge underground cavern. Baby Tooth continues to tug at Jack's tunic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (waving Baby Tooth off) Baby Tooth, Baby...come on! (BEAT) I have to find out what that is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack can't believe his eyes. Dozens of huge bird cages hanging from the ceiling, and in them are the mini tooth fairies. They see Jack, and immediately perk up, tweeting and flitting like crazy. Jack jumps up onto one of the cages, then quickly leaps and holds onto the side of another one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shhhh! keep it down. (leaps to another cage) I'm gonna get you out of here, just as soon as I -- VOICE FROM A MEMORY Jack... Jack turns away from the fairies, distracted. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 88.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack...
