direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (under his breath) As I can -- Jack looks down and sees the tooth drawers from Tooth's Palace. Mounds of them heaped to the ceiling. And inside the drawers are the missing baby teeth. He drops down to a mound and begins rummaging through the drawers, looking at the names on the boxes. In an instant he forgets his duties, and the fairies, and the Guardians and everything except those teeth, and the chance to finally get his memory back. The cavern suddenly goes darker than it already was. Jack finally looks up, as a shadow of Pitch crawls up a nearby column.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Looking for something? Jack swings around with his staff, shooting off a blast of ice, but Pitch isn't there. Jack takes off, following the sound of Pitch's cackle as it echoes throughout the chamber. Jack rounds a corner as he sees Pitch's shadow glide across the walls into a shadowed corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Don't be afraid, Jack. I'm not going to hurt you. Jack continues along a shadowed corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Afraid? Jack sees Pitch on a bridge across the cavern and heads after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not afraid of you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe not. But you are afraid of something. Jack steadily approaches, cautious and alert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think so, huh? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 89.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know so. It's the one thing I always know. Pitch finally turns to face Jack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People's greatest fears. Yours is that no one will ever believe in you. Panic flashes in Jack's eyes. As he backs away, the chamber fills with shadows, and Jack is spun around. He's disoriented as he thuds into a wall, which flips to reveal that it's actually the ground. Pitch, unseen now, chuckles. Jack's unsure of where he is. He looks back to see the cavern entrance -- he's right back where he started.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) And worst of all, you're afraid you'll never know why. Why you? Why were you chosen...to be like this? Jack discovers that the entrance has been blocked with bricks as Pitch's shadow encroaches on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well fear not, for the answer to that... Pitch is now directly in front of Jack, holding out a tooth box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is right here. Jack's eyes widen at the sight - the face of a young boy etched into the box, and under it is the name "Jack Frost."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you want them, Jack? Your memories? He holds them out to Jack. Jack stares, fighting the impulse to grab them. He closes his eyes, struggling to make a decision, but when he opens them again, Pitch has disappeared. Pitch's shadow moves across the pillars of the cavern. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 90. Jack heads down a corridor, cast shadows from the Mini Tooth cages everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Everything you wanted to know... Pitch's face moves in and out of the shadows over the following.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...in this little box. Every time Jack turns, Pitch disappears. It's like Jack's trapped in a fun house. Multiple Pitch shadows have appeared on the wall around Jack. They're closing in on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did you end up like this? Unseen. Unable to reach out to anyone. (BEAT) You want the answers so badly. You want to grab them, and fly off with them. But you're afraid of what the Guardians will think. Jack's breath quickens. He's been pushed into a corner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're afraid of disappointing them. (SMILES) Well let me ease your mind about one thing. They'll never accept you. Not really. The shadows have overcome Jack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (trying to scramble away) Stop it! Stop it! Almost reluctantly, the shadows back away and Pitch appears before Jack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After all, you're not one of them. Jack aims his staff at Pitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know what I am! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 91.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course I do. You're Jack Frost. You make a mess wherever you go. Why, you're doing it right now. Pitch tosses the box to Jack, who instinctively catches it. Jack looks up. Terror comes into Jack's eyes, as he realizes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More to the point Jack, what did you do? Pitch begins to back away, becoming one with the darkness, laughing as he disappears. Jack charges towards him only to be swallowed whole by one of Pitch's black holes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2200 - GUARDIANS BREAK WITH JACK INT. EGG TUNNEL - DAY Jack flies out of Pitch's shadow, ready to strike. Suddenly, Jack realizes he's forgotten something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baby Tooth! He turns to re-enter the hole in the wall only to find himself face to face with one of Bunny's stone emblems.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Happy Easter, Jack. Jack turns around. Suddenly, his eyes fill with dread as he realizes where he is. Thousands of broken egg shells lay strewn about, forming a path toward the light at the end of the tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny peaks through the bushes to take in the scene - an Easter Egg hunt. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 92.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are no eggs. There's none anywhere. I give up. Come on, let's go. I don't understand. Bunny checks the eggs in his basket, then looks back toward the kids.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe he just hid them really well this year. Bunny, egg basket in hand, approaches a group of kids who seem to be wandering around searching halfheartedly, disappointed and listless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Kids! Oi!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I checked everywhere! There's nothing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (steps towards them) Yes there is! There is! I mean these aren't my best lookin' googies, but they'll do in a pinch! He holds out a broken Easter egg. The kids just stare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't believe it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no such thing as the Easter Bunny. The girl turns to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (WALLA) Easter's over. Forget this. It's only then that we realize he's too late. The spark of childhood has already been extinguished in all of them. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 93.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Wrong! Not, not true! I'm right in front of ya, mate!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no such thing. I know. The kids walk through Bunnymund as if he were a ghost. Bunny is stunned by this, and finally realizes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (CONT'D) (WALLA) Now come on. I don't understand. Why wouldn't he come? Let's get out of here. Easter Bunny, where are you? This is the worst Easter ever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They don't see me. (BEAT) They don't see me. JACK's watching this all unfold and it's heartbreaking, because he knows it's his fault. Tooth flies to Bunny's side. Jack hears a rustle in the bushes behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Jack, where were you? Jack sees North, with his scimitars drawn and having just come from battle. He's exhausted, wild-eyed, distraught.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Nightmares attacked the tunnels. They smashed every egg, crushed every basket. Nothing made it to the surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Jack! Tooth rejoins the group from off screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you get that? Jack looks down at the tooth box in his hand, then back to Tooth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was...it's... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 94.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Baby Tooth? (FEELING BETRAYED) Oh Jack, what have you done?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is why you weren't here? North steps forward to confront Jack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were with Pitch?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, listen, listen...I'm sorry. I didn't mean for this to happen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (TO OTHERS) He has to go. Jack turns to see Bunny, disheartened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should never have trusted you! (FORLORN) Easter is new beginnings, new life. Easter is about hope. (BEAT) And now it's gone. Bunny turns away and moves toward the park, looking at the sign that reads, `Easter Egg Hunt.' This is like a punch in Jack's gut. He looks back to Tooth and North, both of whom look away, too hurt by Jack. He looks at them with a pained expression. This is exactly what Pitch said would happen. Jack reaches into his pocket, pulls out the tiny Russian nesting doll that North had given him, drops the doll to the ground, and takes off. As Jack leaves, carried off by the wind, we see the tiny Russian nesting doll laying on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 95.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2600 - JAMIE STILL BELIEVES EXT. JAMIE'S HOUSE - DUSK Jamie, atop a ladder, strains for what looks like an Easter egg, hiding in the rain gutter. The ladder totters and Jamie loses his balance, beginning to fall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoaaa, whoa, whoa...aaaah! Jamie grabs the gutter but it breaks loose, sending Jamie crashing down into a mound of snow. As Jamie gets up off the ground, he sees that the Easter egg was in fact a dirty old tennis ball. Jamie stands up, bewildered, and dusts himself off as his friends LAUGH. A few have empty EASTER BASKETS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's check the park again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For what, the Easter Bunny?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guys, I told you - I saw him! He's way bigger than I thought, and he's got these cool boomerang-things-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grow up, Jamie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah man, seriously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's happened to you guys?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was a dream. You should be happy you still get dreams like that and not... They begin to turn away from him. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 96.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nightmares. Pippa's the lone straggler. She looks tired, depressed, and hands Jamie her basket as she leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget it, Jamie. There's just no Easter this year.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I can't believe this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He really is real! Pippa walks away, trailing the others. Jamie doesn't know what to believe. He hangs his head and looks into the Easter basket, it's empty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know he is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yetis stare at the globe of belief, in shock as more and more lights begin to fad away. We push in toward Antarctica as we-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2304 - JACK IN ANTARCTICA EXT. ICEBERG - ANTARCTIC CIRCLE - DAY Jack runs to the edge of a floating iceberg, ready to throw his tooth box into the ocean. He resists, looking down at the box as he clutches it in his hand. He's never been more alone in his life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I thought this might happen. Pitch is revealed, standing not far behind Jack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They never really believed in you. I was just trying to show you that. But I understand. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 97. Jack whips around and shoots a burst of frost at Pitch, but it's quickly deflected by the Nightmare sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't understand anything! Jack continues to attack, lashing out with his staff. Pitch blocks the attacks of ice and frost -- his control over the Nightmare sand has gained considerable strength.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No? I don't know what it's like to be cast out? Pitch strikes back, putting Jack on the defense. Jack jumps in the air. Their show of force escalates until they're shrouded in a blanket of snow, ice, and wind. As the wind and snow settle, Jack looks around stern and alert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.)(CONT'D) To not be believed in. To long for a family. Jack turns around to find Pitch. There's a look of compassion on Jack's face as he listens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All those years in the shadows I thought, no one else knows what this feels like. But now I see I was wrong. They lock eyes. A moment of true connection between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't have to be alone, Jack. This isn't a trick Pitch is making a real offer here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I believe in you. And I know children will too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Look at what we can do! Pitch gestures to a fantastical ice and nightmare "sculpture" that was created (off-screen) when Jack attacked him. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 98.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What goes together better than cold and dark? Jack looks at the fractured reflections of themselves cast in the icy sculpture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can make them believe. We'll give them a world where everything, everything is... Jack turns to face Pitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch black... Pitch, realizing how this looks, clarifies...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Jack Frost too. They'll believe in both of us. Jack stares at him, considering the offer. Then finally...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, they'll fear both of us. And that's not what I want. Jack turns and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now for the last time, leave me alone. Pitch looks confused and hurt. This is not the response he was expecting. Then...his eyes flame with anger. He made himself vulnerable, and Jack rejected him. No more negotiating now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well. You want to be left alone? Done. But first... Suddenly Jack hears a familiar twitter. Pitch reaches into his coat to pull out...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baby Tooth! Jack charges forward. There's terror in Baby Tooth's eyes. She squeaks as Pitch clenches her tight with his fist. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 99.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The staff, Jack. Jack settles and the winds and snow subsides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have a bad habit of interfering. Now hand it over. (BEAT) And I'll let her go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (twitters - Don't give it to him!) Baby Tooth struggles to get loose, but Pitch only tightens his grip. She can hardly breathe. Jack has no choice. Jack...hands over...the staff. Pitch twirls the staff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: Baby Tooth) Alright, now let her go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. You said you wanted to be alone. (BEAT) So be alone! Baby Tooth squirms until she's finally able to peck Pitch in the hand with her beak. Pitch shrieks and throws Baby Tooth in the air and down into the mouth of a crevasse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Jack, enraged, can't believe what he's seeing. Pitch lifts the staff, and breaks it over his knee, cracking it in two. Light EXPLODES from the staff and terror comes into Jack's eyes, clutching his chest as if in pain. Suddenly, Pitch sends a burst of Nightmare sand, blasting Jack and slamming him into the iceberg wall behind him. As the ice cracks, Jack comes loose and falls forward into the chasm below. Pitch looks down into the ice fissure chuckling. He throws the broken shards of Jack's staff down into the crevasse and casually walks away, disappearing on the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 100.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2308 - JACK'S MEMORY EXT. ICE FISSURE - NIGHT It's cold and dark down here, and Jack is more alone than he's ever been. Battered from the fall, Jack slowly looks up and notices Baby Tooth, lying lifelessly on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baby Tooth! He pulls himself to her and cradles her in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You alright? Baby Tooth nods, but she's hurt, and cold. Jack does his best to shield her from the cold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, all I can do is keep you cold. Jack sits up and holds Baby Tooth in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch was right - I make a mess of everything. Jack is devastated. Baby Tooth's never seen him like this; it's heart breaking...then she gets a thought. Her expression hardens with determination. She wriggles deep into his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey? Jack leans back and begins to close his eyes when he hears
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack... Jack...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and then he FEELS something. Looks down: There's a SOFT, GOLDEN GLOW coming from his pocket. Jack jumps, taken aback. He reaches in and pulls out the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: it's pulsing with light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 101. Baby Tooth gives him a reassuring look. Baby Tooth motions to the box, then looks back at Jack. Jack reaches to touch the box, but as he does its top magically
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to reveal a handful of BABY TEETH - then the box and everything else glows BRIGHT WITH INTENSE LIGHT - The WALLS of the fissure seem to suddenly fall away. In brief FLASHES we see: The COLONIAL SETTLEMENT Jack visited. Children running playfully down a hill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on Jack, you can't have fun all the time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as a familiar BOY hangs upside down from a tree limb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, get down from there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: at a roaring fire as the same boy jokes around with antlers on his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) You're funny, Jack. Jack walks toward the woods with his sister. His mother, face unseen, calls out to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful. Jack shakes his head like he's heard it a million times but never pays it any mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are on an eye, a familiar eye but this one is brown not blue. PULL BACK to reveal young JACK, brown hair, brown eyes. He is staring directly at the camera, a look of...what is it? It's hard to read but it's VERY intense. We keep pulling back to reveal him dressed as we first saw him in
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: th century clothes. Behind him, dark winter trees and snow come in to focus. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 102.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calm, serious) It's okay. It's okay. Don't look down, just look at me. Jack reaches slowly down and removes the second of two rudimentary ice-skates, leaving him BAREFOOT on the surface of a familiar FROZEN pond. And now we see what he sees, a girl of about FOUR (with an uncanny resemblance to Jamie's sister Sophie) stands in her skates, rooted to the spot. A spider's web of cracks emanates from where she stands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, I'm scared.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The ice below her splinters more. She wobbles as it starts to separate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, I know...but you're gonna be alright. You're not gonna fall in. We're gonna have a little fun instead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No we're not!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would I trick you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (fighting back tears) Yes! You always play tricks!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, alright. Well, not, not this time. I promise. I promise, you're gonna be...you're gonna be fine. Jack fixes her gaze...holds it...there's nothing but the two of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have to believe in me. Jack's sister pauses a moment, then smiles through her fear. And just like that, Jack's demeanor changes. A light is switched on inside him and the last thing that could be happening is what is actually happening. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 103.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (casual, playfully) You wanna play a game? We're going to play Hopscotch! Like we play every day! Jack's sister looks more reassured.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's as easy as...one...whoaaaa... And Jack shows his sister the first leap, but mugs for her, almost losing his balance then catching himself. She laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two... (the next jump) Three! He turns toward her with his arms spread out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright... He reaches down to pick up a familiar-looking stick lying on the ice. He extends it towards her -- JACK (CONT'D) Now it's your turn. Jack's sister looks down. She is trying to gather her courage. Jack, never breaking his gaze with her,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One... She hops, wobbling, but catching her balance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it, that's it...two... She's almost there, Jack's staff just beyond her reach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three. She grabs hold of Jack's staff and in one massive effort he slings her with all his might to safety. But the movement propels him into the cracked ice. He looks up to see his sister safe - smiles - and then plunges into the dark cold water. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 104.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack! Jack falls back into the icy water. SPLASH!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're looking up at the hole in the ice, descending into the dark icy depths...then THE FULL MOON appears from behind the clouds as Jack's hands claw through the water towards it, but it's helpless. The MOON glows bright...brighter... Jack's BODY begins to glow, bathed in MOONLIGHT. PUSH IN on his FACE, becoming brighter and brighter until his brown hair turns white and JACK'S BRIGHT BLUE EYES flash open -- EXT. MOUNTAIN FISSURE - NIGHT The icy walls rush back in as we pull out from Jack, reeling from the memory. He sees Baby Tooth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you -- did you see that? She shakes her head `no', tweets `of course not'!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It -- it was me! I had a family! I had a sister! His excitement suddenly turns to realization.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I saved her! He looks up at the opening above. The MOON peeks out from behind the clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers up to Manny) That's why you chose me. (TO HIMSELF) I'm, I'm a Guardian. The Moon seems to shine a little BRIGHTER. Baby Tooth tries to take flight but she sputters and lands back in the palm of Jack's hand. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 105.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have to get out of here. Jack looks down at the two halves of his staff, and picks them up. He tries to fit them back together, but nothing happens. He tries again, this time using every ounce of strength left in him. Baby Tooth watches, her eyes widening as, a SPARK of blue light shoots off the staff. Jack continues to push, until a the icy blue light spreads and melds the two ends of the staff back together. Jack smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly Jack, with Baby Tooth tucked safely in his tunic,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: out of the fissure, high into the sky and through the clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on Baby Tooth! I owe you one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2500 - THE LAST LIGHT INT. PITCH'S LAIR - NIGHT A SERIES OF QUICK CUTS: The Mini Teeth TWITTER as Jack jumps from CAGE to CAGE, opening them as he goes. Jack opens another cage and notices the fairies standing still.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, let's go. Jack looks around and notices that all of the Minis are still in their cages.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong?! The fairies are just standing around, listless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: None of you can fly? Baby Tooth directs Jack's attention to the Globe at the base of Pitch's lair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lights... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 106.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeti very carefully sets the last of a group of newly painted red robot dolls on a shelf. He breathes a sigh of relief. Suddenly, the entire factory begins to shake, knocking the robot doll to the ground. He dives after it, juggles it in the air, and catches it just before it hits the ground. Suddenly, streaks of BLACK SAND whoosh up into and around the factory. The dark sand snakes its way up and around the globe, causing the Yetis and Elves to scatter and knocking
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to the floor. The Yetis and Elves look up in horror as the black sand, now covering the globe, gives rise to Pitch, who stands before them cackling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're all free to go! We won't be needing any Christmas toys this year, thank you! Nor ever again! The yeti with the robot dolls sinks his head and sighs in defeat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack lands on the ground, now standing before PITCH'S GLOBE -- and it looks almost completely devoid of light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're all going out...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch is practically dancing across North's globe, he's so giddy, counting down as the last few lights go dark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only six left! Six precious children who still believe in the Guardians with all their h-- (a lights blinks out) Make that, five. (ANOTHER) Oo! Four! (MOUNTING) Three! (ECSTASY)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 107. His eyes widen as he snaps his fingers with anticipation and glee. All of his hard work and planning - finally paying off! Pitch stares down at the one last light, waiting for it to go out. He snaps his fingers a few more times. Still nothing. His smile fades. His face goes cold as he realizes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack jumps up onto the globe to closely inspect the last light. The light is brought into full view. Jack smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jamie! We're tight on the globe, where the LAST LIGHT flickers. We
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to the light and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...down onto the streets of Burgess. We race over the town until we land on Jamie's house, a single light shining from his bedroom window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2000 - JACK AND JAMIE INT. JAMIE'S ROOM - CONTINUOUS Jamie is sitting up in bed, talking to an old stuffed rabbit, and whispering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay look, you and I are obviously at what they call a crossroads, so here's what's gonna happen - Jack appears outside Jamie's window and moves closer to get a better look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If it wasn't a dream and if you are real, then you have to prove it. Like right now. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 108. Jamie waits. He looks around expectantly. Jack looks on from outside the window, wondering if anything will happen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (desperation creeping in) I've believed in you for a long time, okay? Like my whole life in fact. So you kinda owe me now. Jamie picks up his stuffed rabbit and holds it close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have to do much, just a little sign so I know. Anything. (BEAT) Anything at all. He waits. It's excruciating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knew it. Jamie lets the stuffed animal fall to the floor. Jack comes into the room and watches as the light slowly fades from Jamie's eyes, disbelief setting in. Jack doesn't know what to do. He takes a moment to concentrate, then enters the room. Then, Jamie notices the window as the panes of glass freeze over. The image of an Easter egg suddenly appears...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (seeing the window) Huh? Jamie looks down at the stuffed rabbit on the floor. He can barely comprehend what he's seeing. Jamie looks back to the window as more of the window panes frost over. Jamie's eyes get huge with amazement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's real. Jack, excited, continues to exert himself trying to bring life to his drawing. And when he does, the frost rabbit comes leaping off of the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa... The rabbit hops around Jamie's room, bursting like a snowball over Jamie's head, the snowflakes sprinkling down on him. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 109.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Jack is as amazed as Jamie. But Jamie's amazement turns to confusion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snow? A snowflake lands on the tip of Jamie's nose. The snowflake glows a magic blue. And in that moment a light comes into Jamie's eyes - an idea starts to take hold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack Frost?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a stunned beat) Did he just say--? Jamie stands up on his bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack Frost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He said it again. He said -- (BEAT) You said... Jamie turns around and suddenly his eyes go wide...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack Frost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right! But-but that's me! Jack Frost! That's my name! You said my name! Jamie's mouth drops open. Only then does Jack realize...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, can you hear me? (JAMIE NODS) Can you... Can you see me? (JAMIE NODS) He sees me. He sees me! Jack leaps for joy, and the room suddenly explodes with snow. Jamie can't believe it. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 110.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just made it snow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In my room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're real?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Who do you think brings you all the blizzards and snow days, and you remember when you went flying on that sled the other day?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cool!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what about the Easter Bunny and the Tooth Fairy I mean--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Real-real-real! Every one of us is real!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knew it! Jamie's mom calls from down the hall...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Jamie, who are you talking to?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um...Jack Frost. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 111.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (a little chuckle) ...okay. Suddenly, the sound of thunder and North's sleigh as Jack and Jamie look to the open window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2800 - JACK AND GUARDIANS REUNITE EXT. STREETS OF BURGESS - NIGHT NORTH (O.S.) Whoa, whoa, whoa...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: arrive on the sleigh completely out of control, and crash land outside Jamie's house. The reindeer are separated from the sleigh and run into the woods. A disheveled Tooth and North emerge from the wreckage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, moi deti! Come back! As North stands, his back suddenly gives out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North! Are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is official. My powers are kaput.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look! (GASP) Jack! Jack comes flying toward them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (flies to him) Jack--! Tooth falters and falls to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You okay? They greet each other with a smile as North draws near. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 112.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Same as you. Jack looks off to the side as Jamie appears from out of his backyard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The last light!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to North and Tooth) Wow! It is you! I mean it is you! I knew it wasn't a dream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack! He sees you! Jack puts a protective hand on Jamie's shoulder. Jamie looks up at him and smiles. Jack and North exchange a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, but, where's Bunny?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Losing Easter took its toll on all of us. Bunny most of all. Jack's face goes pale. North lowers his head in sadness. Then a twitchy-nosed LITTLE BUNNY appears on the sleigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh...no...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the Easter Bunny?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now somebody sees me! I mean, where were you about an hour ago, mate?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to him? He used to be huge and cool! And now he's cute. Jamie gently tickles Bunny under his chin. Bunny begins involuntarily thumping his paw.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, that's good. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 113. Bunny catches himself and pushes Jamie's hands away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you tell him to say that? (hops over to Jack) That's it! Let's go! Me and you! Come on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Actually he told me you were real. Just when I started to think that maybe you weren't. Bunny stops. Did he just hear that right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He made you believe? In me? A moment of reconciliation between them, broken by the sounds of THUNDER. The Guardians look to the sky to see Pitch enveloped by dark clouds as he stares down at them from atop a writhing mass of Nightmare sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the others) Get Jamie out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful, Jack! Jack leaps into the air, and goes flying directly at Pitch. Meanwhile, the Guardians take Jamie to find shelter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His eyes flash with anger at see Jack coming toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack Frost! Let's end this, shall we? Pitch sighs as he rolls his eyes and flies down to meet Jack head on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack sends a blast of ice and frost at Pitch as he barrels toward him. Pitch easily absorbs the attack with his Nightmare sand. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 114.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That little trick doesn't work on me anymore. Jack's plan backfires as Pitch charges ahead and unleashes a roaring fury of Nightmare sand that knocks Jack out of the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jamie and the Guardians do their best to avoid the patrolling Nightmares. North struggles to keep up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quick, this way this way! Bunny leads them down an alley, but it's no use.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dead end. Other way other way! Jack suddenly falls from the sky, lands on a dumpster, and falls limp to the ground. THUD! The others turn their attention and wince.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack! They rush to Jack and help him to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was good try, Jack! A for effort!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (groaning in pain) He's stronger. I can't beat him. North and Tooth trade looks of concern. Then, a menacing chuckle. The Guardians keep a watchful eye as Nightmare shadow streaks across the alley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) All this fuss over one little boy. And still he refuses to stop believing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of Thunder reveals the shadow of an approaching Nightmare as the sounds of hooves clacking against the ground echoes from the opposite end of the alley. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 115.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well. There are other ways to snuff out a light. Bulbs start bursting as the arm of a shadow moves across the remaining lights in the alley. Terror in Jamie's eyes. What does that mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you want him, you're gonna have to go through me! With a finger raised, the shadow arm glides along the floor, curling around the back of Bunny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughing, genuinely) Look how fluffy you are! Would you like a scratch behind the ears? Bunny jumps back into North's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you even think about it! Pitch comes into view, riding atop Onyx. A gleeful smile strewn across his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't tell you how happy it makes me to see you all like this. You look awful. They are weak and defenseless. But still the Guardians gather around Jamie, to shield him from whatever may come.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, I'm scared. There's a sudden moment of realization. Jack has heard these words before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Jack, I'm scared.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We pan up from the ice to find his sister as he saw her in his memory. She is smiling. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 116.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I know, I know. But you're gonna be alright...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, wide eyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're gonnna have a little fun, instead. (BEAT) That's it. That's my center. Jamie gives Jack a questioning look. What does Jack have in mind? Pitch gets closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what do you think, Jamie? Do you believe in the Boogiema...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! A snowball suddenly hits Pitch in the face. Two Nightmares look at each, unsure how to react. Jamie can't help but snicker and North lets out a chuckle. Jack looks around the alley. He spots a wooden crate, a trash can lid and a discarded wok amidst a pile of trash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now let's go get your friends. Pitch wipes the snow from his face and looks up to see a track of ice leading out of the alleyway. Jack, Jamie and the Guardians are gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An aerial view of Burgess. The streets are empty and the city is quiet. Suddenly a streak of blue begins to materialize, making its way through the tranquil suburb. A man walks his dog across an empty street when suddenly a cold wind blows behind him. Jack and Jamie come flying past, leaving a trail of ice in their wake. And on that ice - the Guardians careen along in make-shift sleds. They are scared and thrilled, but they're having fun. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 117.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Come on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Cool!
direction.name: direction

location: THE STREETS AND ROOFTOPS OF BURGESS
result.heading: EXT.

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - MOMENTS LATER A terrified Cupcake lies in bed awake. The Guardians' reflections streak across the window when suddenly, BOOF! A snowball strikes the pane of glass. Cupcake pulls the covers down to find that it's suddenly
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: inside! As the snow circles around Cupcake's head, she sits up and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pippa sits in bed amazed as it snows in her room. She hears a KNOCK at her window and moves toward it to find Jamie floating outside. She throws open her window and looks down to the ground to reveal that they are two stories up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jamie, how are you doing that?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack Frost! Come on, we need your help! Jamie takes off flying down the street, and as a snowflake lands on her nose she suddenly sees him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey is, is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Jack Frost! Pippa looks up to see Monty across the street with his head out the window and snow coming down in his room, a gaping smile across his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS Caleb and Claude sit up in bed in amazement, staring at the snowflakes as they stream down from the ceiling. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 118.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The twins look down to find neatly wrapped gifts at the feet of their beds as a jolly voice bellows in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Merry Christmas! The twins open their window, amazed to see their heroes sled past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Happy Easter!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't forget to floss! Caleb looks to his brother, dumbfounded. Suddenly Cupcake skids past, laughing and screaming on her own sled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cupcake? And so it goes through the town.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Jamie you were right!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Easter Bunny's real!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) And the Tooth Fairy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Santa!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) They're all real!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 119.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 2900 - SHOWDOWN EXT. STREETS OF BURGESS - MOMENTS LATER Jack, the Guardians, and the children all come to gliding halt on their sleds. They look up to see Pitch standing atop a building with a confident smile, while the clouds stir behind him. Monty, late to the party, comes running joyously past Jamie and the Guardians who stand in silence as they stare up at the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, yeaaaaaaaah!!! (sees Pitch, makes U-Turn) Ahhhhhhhhhhhh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think a few children can help you? Against this! The Nightmare sand storm descends from the sky. North draws his sword, but the weight of the blade pulls him down. He can barely stand. Jack moves to North's side as they look back to Jamie, noticing the concern on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're just bad dreams, Jamie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And we'll protect you, mate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aww, you'll protect them. (SMILES) But who will protect you? Jamie takes a moment to reflect while his friends look up at the sky in fear. Jack looks down, surprised, to see that Jamie has taken a position in FRONT of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will. Suddenly, Jamie's friends move to join him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 120.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll try. The Guardians, amazed, watch as the kids squeeze past them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still think there's no such thing as the boogeyman? Pitch's wave of Nightmare sand snakes its way through town causing destruction wherever it goes and converges toward a single point as it heads straight toward the kids.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do believe in you. I'm just not afraid of you. Jamie thrusts out his hand toward the Nightmare wave. His friends follow suite, just as the Nightmare sand smashes into them. As it makes contact, the black sand...bursts into streams of GOLDEN DREAMSAND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa...whoaaaa! Everyone is amazed, hardly believing their eyes. Streams of Dreamsand swirl around the children. And then it's pandemonium. The Nightmares buck and jump as the sand makes its way past them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He watches, aghast, as his precious Nightmares transform back into golden Dreamsand and makes its way across town.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tooth, amazed, watches as her wings suddenly flutter with a resurgence of strength and energy. She takes off and flies past the kids who cheer her on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, Tooth Fairy! Whooaaa! North's eyes widen. He straightens his back and unsheathes his scimitars. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 121.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, yeah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Get them! Pitch gives a signal and sends another wave of Nightmares toward the Guardians.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do your jobs!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The petite rabbit looks at himself, waiting to be transformed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah, come on, come on! When suddenly he's pursued by a snarling Nightmare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, crikey! Bunny takes off running.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North throws two snowglobes down to the ground, through which an army of yetis and elves emerge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny tries to scurry under a parked car in order to evade the attacking Nightmare, but he is snatched by his tail before he can get away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just a bunny! Suddenly, Bunny transforms back to his normal size and whips out his boomerangs while being held upside down. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 122.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: G'day, mate! Bunny kicks the Nightmare, flips into the air, and throws his boomerangs which slice through two more Nightmares, turning them to dust. Bunny drums his feet on the ground and an army of sentinel eggs suddenly rise up out of the earth. Caleb finds himself riding on top of one as they join the yetis and elves in battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! Wooooohoooo! Elves riding toy ducks and planes come flying in overhead like bombardiers, turning Nightmares into puffs of black sand as they fly through them. The kids look to see a Nightmare charging toward them, only to stop in it's tracks once the kids turn to face it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get `em!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaaaaahhhhhh! The kids, accompanied by two elves in a bike and side car, charge an incoming Nightmare. The elf behind the wheel lunges toward it, biting at its haunches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on guys, we can do it! The kids put their hands on the Nightmare, turning it to Dreamsand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch looks down with a smile at the chaos in the streets below. Suddenly, a THUD! Pitch turns toward the noise to see Jack on the roof. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 123. Jack quickly sends a streak of frost toward Pitch's Nightmares, disabling a few of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS The Guardians turn toward the explosions of ice and snow taking place atop the surrounding buildings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS Pitch begins to charge and responds with an attack of his own. Jack jumps to an adjacent roof and lets out another blast of ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS BUNNYMUND (TO NORTH) All yours, mate. Bunny taps his foot on the ground and creates a rabbit hole for North and himself to travel through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS Jack runs into Pitch as he rounds the corner of a chimney. Pitch let's a Nightmare arrow fly, which is suddenly deflected by Tooth as she flies through the area and takes out a few Nightmares of her own.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, Tooth! Suddenly, Bunny comes flying out of a nearby chimney, drawing his boomerang as he lands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ho, ho, HO! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 124. The Nightmares surrounding Pitch explode into dust as the boomerang tears through them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS North shoots out of a bunny hole, his scimitars at the ready, only to have landed on a roof some distance from the Guardians.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hyah! (LOOKS AROUND) Wrong roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS Pitch tries to escape the attacking Guardians and slips into a nearby shadow, emerging through the side of the building. North jumps off the roof to greet him mid-air with his scmitars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS Pitch is knocked to the ground. As he gets to his feet he forms a scythe with his Nightmare sand and begins crossing swords with North. In an instant Pitch finds himself surrounded by the Guardians. Each of them take their turn to deal Pitch a few humiliating blows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS Jamie looks over Caleb's shoulder as a wisp of Dreamsand leaves his palms and rises into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at that!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gets an idea) I got it. (off their confused looks) (MORE) Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 125.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what we have to do! Guys, come on! Jamie leads his friends as they follow the streams of Dreamsand down the street toward the growing mass of golden sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS The Guardians advance toward Pitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's over Pitch! There's no place to hide. Pitch give them a wry smile and quickly descends into the shadows, casting multiple versions of himself along the alley walls. Suddenly, in their moment of distraction, Pitch rises up behind Jack, his Nightmare sand AXE in hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, look out! The other Guardians look on in horror as-- A golden whip wraps itself round Pitch's hands. We follow the whip to reveal Sandy, coalescing from the funnel cloud of Dreamsand. He gives Pitch a look, wags his finger, and then uppercuts him into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (WALLA) Whoa! The Sandman! Sandy looks off to the side to where Jamie and his friends have gathered. He forms a Dreamsand hat and tips the cap to Jamie. Jamie, gleeful, waves back to Sandy as his friends stand behind him in awe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man, this is so cool! Yeah, alright! Wahoo! Wow! Sandy then looks to his whip and tugs on it, slamming Pitch into the ground and knocking him out. The Guardians cheer as they welcome Sandy's return. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 126.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome back, old friend!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Sandy. You're alright!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sandy, come here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mate, you are a sight for sore eyes! Sandy floats into the air, and shoots streams of Dreamsand in every direction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS A wisp of Dreamsand floats into a child's bedroom and touches his forehead while he sleeps. Suddenly, a Dreamsand figure forms above the child's head, it's the Tooth Fairy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lights begin to appear on the globe. Baby Tooth notices this, and perks up. Her wings start to flutter. Other fairies begin to fly. They shoot down to the tooth boxes and begin opening them. We see one of the faces on a box, and transition to the actual child who she goes from sad to happy as her fondest memories flood back. We zoom out of her face to see thousands of fluttering fairies and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sophie peers out of her bedroom window, watching as streams of Dreamsand dance along the Burgess skyline.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 127.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More and more windows begin to shine bright with gold as swirls of Dreamsand fill the night sky. We pull back to reveal the globe in North's sleigh, now decorated with spots of yellow light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - CONTINUOUS A Nightmare comes barreling towards Cupcake. It screeches to a halt, inches from the girl's face. She gently taps the creature on the nose and turns into a Dreamsand Unicorn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa... A gigantic Dreamsand dinosaur foot comes down revealing a Dreamsand brontosaurus. As Dreamsand creatures fill the streets, the Guardians and children rejoice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Jamie stands in awe of a school of beautiful Dreamsand fish as they float by. Suddenly, he's hit in the head with a snowball. He turns to look and sees Jack, smiling. Jamie picks up a snowball and throws it at his friends. Almost instantaneously, a snowball fight ensures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah? Bring it on! Sandy salutes Jack and North, who are standing off to the side while the snowball fight escalates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your center?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It took awhile, but I figured it out. North tosses Jack a small item. Jack catches it and looks to his open palm, it's a Russian nesting doll in the image of Jack, similar to those found in North's workshop. Jack smiles and North gives him a wink in return. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 128.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! North is suddenly hit by a snowball and turns. He sees Claude, Caleb, and an elf; they immediately point fingers at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooohhh. A beat, until North bursts out in laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're all on naughty list. (TO BUNNY) Bunny, think fast! He throws a snowball, which hits Bunny smack in the face. Pitch groans in pain, and rises up to see the town crawling with Dreamsand creatures, snowballs flying and yetis playing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He whips around to see the kids - having the time of their lives - and no fear in their eyes. He rises up, his entire body shaking with rage, and screams at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You dare have fun in my presence! I am the Boogeyman! AND YOU WILL FEAR ME! He lunges at Jamie who come running toward him, Pitch's hands outstretched as if he's going to grab him by the throat. But Jamie runs right through him, laughing, joyous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noooo! Pitch gasps, realizing that he no longer has any power over the children. The devastation plays across his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (under his breathe) No. He sees the Guardians approach, standing side by side with one another. Pitch turns and flees into the forest. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 129.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pitch runs through the shadows in terror. He comes crashing through the trees of the forest, and out onto the ice of the pond. He looks over his shoulder to see if the Guardians are on his tail, when BOOM! He runs smack into North's chest. Pitch slips on the ice, and falls backwards. He looks up to see North smiling down at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leaving the party so soon?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't even say goodbye. Tooth tosses something to Pitch which he catches. He looks down. It's a quarter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A quarter?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A fist punches him right in the jaw, and a single tooth goes skittering across the ice. Tooth shakes out her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's for my fairies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't get rid of me! Not forever! There will always be fear!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what? As long as one child believes, we will be here to fight fear!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? Then what are they doing here? Hundreds of Nightmares emerge from the woods, surrounding the pond. It's terrifying, but the Guardians seem unphased.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They can't be my Nightmares, I'm not afraid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like it's your fear they smell. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 130. Suddenly, Pitch's eyes get huge with terror as the Nightmares move in on him. He begins to back away, but the Nightmares pick up speed as they charge toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhh, no....AAAAAHHHHHH!! He tries to run, but it's impossible to get his footing on the ice. He falters, and is swept up in the stampede of Nightmares. The streaks of black whip and latch themselves onto Pitch as the black cloud carries him through the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, nooooooo! Pitch struggles to escape, but the mass of black sand pulls him deep into the forest, under the frame of the broken bed, and back down into the dark depths of the underground. He looks up at the moon as he disappears and the hole in the earth seals itself up.
direction.name: direction
